title: Implement data models in Python
description: Implement models.py: IssueData, Config, Dependency, Comment dataclasses. JSON serialization with pretty-printing, RFC3339 timestamps, sorted keys.
creator: Ryan Alyn Porter

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Goal: implement Python data models and config loader with validation per spec, using Pydantic for boundary validation.

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Implemented Python data models and configuration loader with validation. Added unit tests and updated dependencies. make check-python passed.
